scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts two figures, likely saints, standing before a richly decorated, ornate doorway or gate. The figure on the left, dressed in pink and green robes, holds a large, ornate key. The figure on the right, in blue and green robes, also holds a key. Both figures have halos, indicating their saintly status. Behind them, a patterned screen or curtain is visible, suggesting an interior or a sacred space. The overall composition is framed by an arched border with decorative elements.
